id: Notion: SEO Tracker and Keyword Planner
name: Notion: SEO Tracker and Keyword Planner
description: This Notion Dashboard is SEO-focused for small businesses and service providers who are looking to optimize their content. In this dash, you'll find free resources, the steps I followed in planning out how to optimize my content, instructions on how to perform a routine audit, a notebook with an audit template so you can easily plug in the info you need to focus on, and content brainstorming templates.
